patient-portal.title: Patient Portal
patient-portal.shortDesc: Complete health dashboard for patients and their families.

sections.title: Personal Health Dashboard
sections.text: Your complete medical information center consolidates all aspects of your healthcare experience into a single, easy-to-navigate interface.
sections.details: The Patient Dashboard is your personal health command center, with fast access to your entire medical history at your fingertips. This unified platform reduces the inconvenience of maintaining paper data and keeps you up to date on your health status.
features: Complete medical history, including a timeline of all consultations and treatments.
Active medication list, including dosing schedules and refill reminders.
Upcoming appointments with one-click navigation and calendar sync.
Health vitals tracking charts illustrate trends in blood pressure, weight, and other crucial indicators.
Personalized wellness objectives and progress tracking for chronic illness management.

sections.title: Smart Appointment Booking
sections.text: Book, reschedule, or cancel healthcare appointments using intelligent scheduling that considers both your time and the doctor's availability.
features: Real-time doctor availability calendar with specialty-based filtering
Live queue position tracking on appointment day - see exactly how many patients ahead
One-tap rescheduling with automatic conflict detection
Video consultation option for follow-ups and minor health questions
Manage appointments for family members from one account.
Automatic SMS and push notifications for appointment reminders

sections.title: Digital Medical Records
sections.text: You may instantly access all of your diagnostic findings, medications, and medical papers in high-resolution digital format.
sections.details: Every lab test, X-ray, MRI scan, and prescription is automatically posted to your account once validated by medical professionals. You may download, distribute, or print any document at any time and from anywhere. All records are encrypted and securely stored in accordance with healthcare data protection guidelines.
features: Instant download of lab reports in PDF format as soon as they're validated
High-resolution medical imaging (X-rays, CT scans, MRI) with zoom and annotation features.
Complete prescription history, including drug names, doses, and prescribing doctors.
Secure sharing capability for sending records to other healthcare professionals.
Automatic categorization based on date, department, and document type
Cloud backup ensures that your records are not lost.

sections.title: Transparent Billing & Payments
sections.text: Clear, itemized invoicing with numerous secure payment alternatives and immediate receipt generation for insurance claims.
features: Detailed bill breakdowns of consultation fees, diagnostic expenses, and prescription costs
Real-time payment processing and fast confirmation.
Several payment methods: UPI, cards, internet banking, and digital wallets
Automatically generate tax invoices for insurance reimbursement.
Payment history and printable receipts for all previous transactions.
Pending dues alerts and payment plans for greater medical expenses.

doctor-terminal.title: Doctor Terminal
doctor-terminal.shortDesc: Professional consultation interface for clinical excellence.

sections.title: Intelligent Patient Queue Management
sections.text: Stay organized with a real-time smart queue that automatically prioritizes patients based on urgency, appointment time, and medical needs.
sections.details: The Doctor Terminal features an advanced queue management system that tracks every patient waiting for consultation. The 'Next Patient' button intelligently suggests who to see next, while emergency cases are automatically flagged and pushed to the top of the queue.
features: Live patient queue with real-time updates showing exact waiting positions
'Next Patient' smart recommendation based on appointment time and urgency
Emergency_case auto-flagging with visual and audio alerts
Estimated wait time calculator to inform patients accurately

sections.title: Comprehensive Patient Medical History
sections.text: Access complete longitudinal health records with interactive timelines showing every consultation, diagnosis, prescription, and lab result.
sections.details: View a patient's entire medical journey in one screen. Our system aggregates data from all previous visits, lab tests, prescriptions, and hospital admissions to give you the full clinical picture before you even start the consultation.
features: Chronological timeline view of all past consultations and treatments
Interactive vitals chart showing BP, weight, and sugar trends over time
Complete medication history with current active prescriptions
Previous diagnoses with ICD-10 codes and treatment outcomes

sections.title: Smart Digital Prescription System
sections.text: Create prescriptions faster with AI-assisted drug suggestions, automatic dosage calculations, and pharmacy inventory checks.
sections.details: Our intelligent prescription engine suggests medicines based on the diagnosis, checks for drug interactions and allergies in real-time, and verifies availability in the hospital pharmacy before you prescribe. Everything is saved digitally and sent instantly to the patient's mobile app.
features: AI-powered medicine suggestions based on diagnosed condition
Real-time drug interaction and allergy conflict warnings
Pharmacy stock verification to ensure medicine availability
Auto-complete for medicine names with dosage recommendations

sections.title: Seamless Cross-Department Integration
sections.text: Order lab tests, request consultations from specialists, and send patients to pharmacy or discharge—all from one unified interface.
sections.details: The Doctor Terminal is fully integrated with every hospital department. Order diagnostic tests that instantly appear in the Lab queue, write prescriptions that the pharmacy can pre-pack, or refer patients to specialists with one click.
features: One-click lab test ordering with instant notification to diagnostic team
Specialist referral system with automatic appointment scheduling
Direct communication with nursing staff for admitted patients
Admission request workflow with bed availability checking

hospital-admin.title: Hospital Admin
hospital-admin.shortDesc: Central command hub for managing hospital operations, finances, staff, and communications.

sections.title: Real-Time Resource Tracking
sections.text: Monitor and control hospital resources in real time to ensure smooth clinical and operational workflows.
sections.details: The Real-Time Resource Tracking module gives hospital administrators complete visibility into beds, diagnostic services, pharmacy requests, and inter-department coordination. It helps eliminate delays, reduce manual follow-ups, and ensures that every department operates in sync with real-time demand.
features: Live tracking of bed availability across wards, ICU, and emergency units
Centralized lab test orders with real-time status updates
Pharmacy request monitoring with prescription fulfillment status
Inter-department referrals with instant notifications

sections.title: Financial Governance
sections.text: Gain complete control over hospital finances with transparent, department-wise financial insights.
sections.details: The Financial Governance module provides a consolidated view of the hospital’s revenue streams, operational expenses, and profitability. Administrators can track billing performance, identify cost leakages, and make informed decisions to maintain financial sustainability and compliance.
features: Real-time revenue tracking from OPD, IPD, diagnostics, and pharmacy
Department-wise income and expense analysis
Outstanding dues and payment reconciliation reports
Integration with billing and payment systems

sections.title: System-Wide Communications
sections.text: Deliver critical information instantly across the hospital ecosystem.
sections.details: The System-Wide Communications module ensures timely and consistent communication with all hospital personnel. Whether it’s an emergency alert, policy update, or operational announcement, messages reach the right users without delay.
features: Emergency broadcast alerts to all departments
Targeted announcements for specific roles or units
Policy and protocol update notifications
Read-receipt tracking for critical communications

sections.title: Staff & Doctor Management
sections.text: Efficiently manage doctors, nurses, and support staff from onboarding to performance evaluation.
sections.details: This module enables administrators to oversee workforce operations, including scheduling, attendance, and role assignments. It ensures optimal staffing levels, improves accountability, and supports data-driven performance assessments across all hospital departments.
features: Centralized staff directory with roles and department mapping
Duty roster and shift scheduling for doctors and nurses
Leave management and approval workflows
Attendance and working-hours tracking

lab-diagnostics.title: Lab & Diagnostics
lab-diagnostics.shortDesc: Comprehensive laboratory management with precise sample tracking and automated diagnostic reporting.

sections.title: End-to-End Sample Tracking
sections.text: Track every diagnostic sample from collection to final report with complete transparency and accuracy.
sections.details: This module ensures that each sample is uniquely identified and continuously tracked throughout its lifecycle. From patient collection to lab processing and validation, every step is logged digitally to eliminate mix-ups, delays, and manual errors.
features: Unique barcode or QR code generation for every sample
Real-time status updates from collection to report approval
Sample rejection and recollection tracking with reasons
Department-wise sample routing and prioritization

sections.title: Automated Report Delivery
sections.text: Deliver validated diagnostic reports instantly to patients and doctors without manual intervention.
sections.details: Once test results are verified by authorized lab personnel, reports are automatically published to the patient portal and the doctor’s dashboard. This reduces turnaround time and ensures timely clinical decisions.
features: Instant digital report publishing after validation
Automatic notifications to patients and doctors
Downloadable and printable PDF reports
Critical value alerts for abnormal results

sections.title: LIS Integration
sections.text: Integrate seamlessly with existing Laboratory Information Systems for unified data management.
sections.details: The LIS Integration module allows labs to connect their existing systems directly with the CureChain platform. This ensures consistent data flow, eliminates duplicate data entry, and maintains a single source of truth for diagnostic records.
features: Bi-directional data sync with LIS platforms
Automatic test order imports from doctors
Real-time status updates from lab machines
Error reduction through system-level validation

sections.title: Quality Control Dashboard
sections.text: Maintain high diagnostic accuracy through continuous monitoring of lab quality standards.
sections.details: The Quality Control Dashboard provides administrators with real-time insights into equipment performance, reagent usage, and compliance with standard operating procedures. This ensures consistent accuracy and regulatory adherence across all lab operations.
features: Equipment calibration and maintenance tracking
Quality control sample monitoring
Protocol compliance checklists
Error and deviation reporting

pharmacy-pos.title: Pharmacy POS
pharmacy-pos.shortDesc: Smart pharmacy management with digital prescriptions, real-time inventory, and seamless billing.

sections.title: Digital Prescription Fetching
sections.text: Instantly receive and process digital prescriptions as soon as doctors authorize them.
sections.details: This feature eliminates handwritten prescriptions and manual entry. Once a doctor signs a prescription, it appears instantly on the pharmacy screen, ensuring faster dispensing, fewer errors, and a smoother patient checkout experience.
features: Real-time prescription visibility after doctor approval
Clear display of drug names, dosage, and duration
Automatic validation against patient records
Flags for allergies and drug interactions

sections.title: Inventory Alert System
sections.text: Maintain optimal stock levels with automated alerts and expiry monitoring.
sections.details: The Inventory Alert System continuously tracks medicine stock levels and expiration dates. It helps pharmacy staff avoid stockouts, reduce wastage due to expiry, and ensure uninterrupted availability of critical medications.
features: Real-time stock quantity tracking
Low-stock and out-of-stock alerts
Batch-wise expiry date monitoring
FIFO (First-In, First-Out) dispensing support

sections.title: One-Click Billing
sections.text: Generate accurate pharmacy bills instantly with integrated pricing and discounts.
sections.details: This module automates the billing process by linking prescriptions directly to inventory and pricing rules. Bills are generated in one click, ensuring accuracy, faster payments, and seamless integration with hospital billing systems.
features: Automatic bill generation from prescriptions
Real-time price calculation based on inventory
Hospital and insurance discount application
Tax-compliant invoice generation

sections.title: Medication History Log
sections.text: Maintain a complete audit trail of all dispensed medications for safety and compliance.
sections.details: The Medication History Log records every drug dispensed to a patient, including batch numbers and dispensing staff. This ensures traceability, improves patient safety, and supports compliance with pharmaceutical regulations.
features: Patient-wise medication history tracking
Batch and lot number traceability
Dispensing staff accountability logs
Support for drug recall investigations

emergency-ems.title: Emergency & EMS
emergency-ems.shortDesc: Mission-critical emergency response system for ambulance dispatch, trauma care, and real-time coordination.

sections.title: Ambulance Dispatch Tracker
sections.text: Track ambulances in real time and coordinate emergency dispatch for the fastest possible response.
sections.details: The Ambulance Dispatch Tracker provides live GPS visibility of all ambulances, enabling dispatch teams to assign the nearest available unit. It reduces response times, improves route planning, and ensures efficient coordination between EMS teams and hospitals.
features: Live GPS tracking of ambulances
Nearest-vehicle auto-assignment
Route optimization with traffic awareness
Dispatch status updates (en-route, on-scene, arriving)

sections.title: Trauma Bed Mapping
sections.text: View real-time ER and ICU bed availability to prepare for incoming critical patients.
sections.details: This module provides instant visibility into emergency and trauma bed availability across ER, ICU, and specialty units. It allows hospitals to prepare equipment and staff before patient arrival, reducing delays in life-saving care.
features: Live ER, ICU, and trauma bed availability
Bed reservation for incoming emergency cases
Critical care equipment readiness indicators
Automatic bed release after patient transfer

sections.title: Live Trauma Feed
sections.text: Receive patient vitals and incident updates from EMS teams while en route to the hospital.
sections.details: The Live Trauma Feed enables EMS teams to transmit patient vitals, injury details, and observations directly to the ER. This allows doctors to prepare treatment protocols, assemble trauma teams, and reduce time to intervention.
features: Real-time vitals streaming from ambulance devices
Pre-arrival patient condition summaries
Photo and note sharing from accident scenes
Automatic alerting for critical vitals

sections.title: Incident Logging
sections.text: Capture emergency patient data from the moment of rescue for accurate clinical records.
sections.details: The Incident Logging module allows rapid data entry in high-pressure situations. It ensures that patient records begin at the scene of rescue, maintaining continuity of care from EMS to emergency department treatment.
features: Quick-entry forms optimized for emergency use
Time-stamped incident and rescue logs
Initial diagnosis and triage categorization
Integration with ER admission workflows

helpdesk-reception.title: Helpdesk & Reception
helpdesk-reception.shortDesc: Central front-desk system for fast patient onboarding, queue management, and appointment coordination.

sections.title: Digital Patient Onboarding
sections.text: Register patients quickly with minimal data entry while ensuring accuracy and security.
sections.details: The Digital Patient Onboarding module streamlines registration by capturing essential patient details using OTP-based verification. It reduces waiting times, prevents duplicate records, and instantly links patients to appointments, consultations, lab reports, prescriptions, and billing workflows.
features: Quick registration with mobile number and OTP verification
Automatic duplicate record detection
Instant patient ID generation
Direct mapping to appointments and consultations

sections.title: Queue Coordination
sections.text: Manage patient flow efficiently with real-time queue visibility and control.
sections.details: This module provides live queue status across departments, allowing staff and doctors to track patient progress. It enables smooth patient flow management, prioritization of emergency cases, and reduced waiting time in OPD and specialty clinics.
features: Live queue display with patient status indicators
One-click next-patient calling for doctors
Priority handling for emergencies and senior citizens
Skip, hold, or reassign patient options

sections.title: Appointment Validation
sections.text: Verify appointments quickly and check in patients without manual effort.
sections.details: The Appointment Validation feature allows reception staff to confirm online bookings using QR code scanning or appointment IDs. This ensures faster check-ins, reduces manual errors, and keeps schedules perfectly synchronized with doctors’ availability.
features: QR code–based appointment check-in
Instant verification of online and offline bookings
Automatic queue assignment after check-in
Real-time schedule updates for doctors

sections.title: General Information Hub
sections.text: Provide accurate information to patients and visitors at all times.
sections.details: The General Information Hub gives front-desk staff access to real-time doctor schedules, department timings, and service availability. It ensures that patient and visitor queries are answered accurately, improving overall experience and trust.
features: Live doctor and department schedules
Service availability and operating hours
OPD, lab, and pharmacy guidance
Internal hospital directory access

staff-portal.title: Staff Portal
staff-portal.shortDesc: Self-service employee management platform for non-clinical hospital staff.

sections.title: Shift & Roster Management
sections.text: View and manage work schedules, department assignments, and duty rotations from one place.
sections.details: The Shift & Roster Management module allows staff members to stay informed about their daily schedules and assignments. It reduces confusion, improves punctuality, and ensures smooth coordination across departments.
features: Personalized shift calendar view
Department and role-based assignments
Holiday and rotation schedules
Real-time roster updates
Shift swap and approval requests
Notifications for schedule changes

sections.title: Attendance & Payroll
sections.text: Track attendance and access salary details with complete transparency.
sections.details: This module provides a unified view of attendance records and payroll information. Staff can check daily attendance logs, download salary slips, and view tax deductions and incentives without HR dependency.
features: Daily attendance logging and history
Integration with biometric or access systems
Downloadable salary slips
Tax and statutory deduction visibility

sections.title: Internal Communications
sections.text: Stay informed with instant access to hospital updates and internal resources.
sections.details: The Internal Communications module serves as a central repository for hospital policies, safety guidelines, announcements, and training materials. It ensures that staff always have access to the latest information.
features: Hospital handbook and policy access
Safety and compliance documentation
Internal announcements and notices
Training manuals and learning resources

sections.title: Leave & Request Workflow
sections.text: Submit leave applications and administrative requests with real-time status updates.
sections.details: This module simplifies interactions with HR by digitizing leave requests and administrative approvals. Staff can track request status, receive notifications, and maintain a transparent record of all submissions.
features: Online leave application and approval flow
Real-time request status tracking
Leave balance visibility
Administrative request submissions

discharge-center.title: Discharge Center
discharge-center.shortDesc: Centralized discharge management for faster clearances, accurate summaries, and smooth patient exit.

sections.title: Department Clearance Sync
sections.text: Ensure all mandatory department clearances are completed before patient discharge.
sections.details: The Department Clearance Sync module provides real-time visibility into discharge approvals from Pharmacy, Laboratory, Nursing, and other departments. It prevents delays, avoids manual follow-ups, and ensures a safe and compliant discharge process.
features: Live clearance status from pharmacy, lab, and nursing
Automatic notifications for pending approvals
Block discharge until mandatory clearances are completed
One-click clearance verification

sections.title: Digital Discharge Summary
sections.text: Create comprehensive, professional discharge summaries with clinical accuracy.
sections.details: This module enables staff and doctors to generate standardized discharge summaries that include diagnosis, treatment provided, medications, follow-up instructions, and lifestyle advice. Summaries are digitally signed and instantly available to patients.
features: Structured discharge summary templates
Automatic population of clinical data
Medicine schedules and dosage instructions
Follow-up dates and care guidelines

sections.title: Billing Reconciliation
sections.text: Confirm all financial transactions are completed before patient exit.
sections.details: The Billing Reconciliation module ensures that all consultation, investigation, pharmacy, and room charges are settled. It synchronizes with the finance department to avoid revenue leakage and discharge delays.
features: Real-time billing status visibility
Pending dues and advance adjustment checks
Integration with hospital billing systems
Final invoice generation

sections.title: Follow-up Booking
sections.text: Ensure continuity of care by scheduling follow-up visits at discharge.
sections.details: This module automatically assists staff in booking follow-up appointments as part of the discharge workflow. It improves patient compliance, reduces readmissions, and ensures timely post-discharge care.
features: Automatic follow-up appointment suggestions
Doctor and department availability matching
Calendar-based scheduling
Patient notification via SMS and app

nurse-portal.title: Nurse Portal
nurse-portal.shortDesc: Real-time nursing dashboard for vitals monitoring, MAR, and ward management.

sections.title: Medication Administration (MAR)
sections.text: Digital logging of medication delivery ensure the right dose for the right patient at the right time.
sections.details: The Medication Administration Record (MAR) digitizes the drug delivery process. Nurses receive scheduled alerts for medication times, scan patient IDs for verification, and log every dose administered to prevent errors and ensure compliance.
features: Automated medication schedule alerts and reminders
Double-check verification for high-risk medications
Digital signature for administration accountability
Instant sync with Pharmacy for refill requests

sections.title: Patient Vitals Monitoring
sections.text: Track and record patient health metrics in real time with automated trend alerts.
sections.details: The Vitals Monitoring module allows nurses to capture and monitor critical health indicators such as BP, Heart Rate, SpO2, and temperature. The system automatically highlights abnormal trends, ensuring proactive clinical intervention.
features: Digital vitals entry with instant synchronization to Doctor Terminal
Real-time alerts for critical physiological changes
Graphical trend visualization for longitudinal tracking
Shift-wise vitals summary for effective handovers

sections.title: Nursing Task Queue
sections.text: A prioritized list of daily clinical tasks, rounds, and patient care activities.
sections.details: Stay organized with a smart task queue that prioritizes nursing activities based on urgency and schedule. From routine rounds to specific clinical procedures, the system ensures no task is overlooked during busy shifts.
features: Prioritized daily tasks based on patient care plans
Shift handover reports with automated summaries
Incident and observation logging at the bedside
Seamless coordination with doctors for stat orders

sections.title: Ward & Bed Management
sections.text: Complete oversight of patient placement, movements, and bed availability within the ward.
sections.details: Manage your assigned ward efficiently with live bed mapping. Track patient admissions, transfers, and discharges in real time, ensuring optimal resource utilization and smooth patient transitions.
features: Interactive ward floor plan with bed status indicators
One-click patient transfer and movement logging
Bed cleaning and maintenance status tracking
Real-time coordination with Hospital Admin for admissions
